page.title: 09M.F.I. FURNITURE CENTRE.
page.content: Situated on the Greenhill Industrial Estate M.F.I. sells a wide range of furniture,most sales coming from kitchen & bedroom equipment. Throughout the country they have 120 stores & belong to a group of companies including Asda,Hygena & Allied Carpets.They have 28 employees on the site,four of these work at Brentfords,a store within the store. If profits increase further expansion is planned providing more jobs and a wider choice of goods. Furniture supplies come Northampton where a 100 lorries can be loaded simultaneously.A main frame computer in London keeps information up to date through 6 in store terminals.Smaller systems within the store speed up sales and reduce waiting time for customers who come from surrounding counties.
